reviewText: This DVD is in German and won't play on DVD players in the USA. It's in PAL format for European us only. They should make this more clear.
this is an extremely enjoyable thriller, sexy and erotic,especially if you are a shannoned whirry fan i highly recommend this dvd
The DVD was a Great addiction Thank You! It was what i really wanted anyway, what a great touch to do that.

with Tawny Kitaen (best legs in the business) and Shannon Whirry in the same movie it can't be too bad. about guy having affair with Whirry while his boss tries to seduce Kitaen,his wife. Kind of sexy, with happy ending
